body.p:
You can use the Itemize action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Rewrite category to ask the AI Positron to change a DITA topic's selected content by converting a paragraph to a list of items.

End users find the Itemize AI action incredibly useful because it simplifies the process of organizing information from a lengthy paragraph into a concise and structured list. With just a single click, this AI action can scan through a paragraph, identify key points, and present them in a clear and organized manner. This AI action saves users valuable time and effort that they would otherwise spend manually extracting and categorizing information. Whether users need to summarize important details from an article, extract action items from meeting minutes, or create a to-do list from a lengthy email, this AI action streamlines the task of creating lists, making it a highly efficient tool for any user who wants to organize and prioritize information.
Open the topic, select the paragraph inside it and invoke the Itemize action.

You can use the Join Items action from the AI Positron Assistant
Actions Rewrite category to ask the AI Positron to change a DITA topic's selected content by converting a list of items to a paragraph containing a comma separated enumeration of items.
Open the topic , select the paragraph inside it and invoke the Join Items action.
